name: Square DANMAKU
description:
This game is only available in Japanese

【Rules】

You are the green square.
If you hit the enemy, a square of a different color, it's the end.
Survive longer!

【Controls】 ・WASD key

You can move.

・Mouse cursor

Aiming of bullets.
When you move the cursor over an enemy, it automatically compensates to make bullets easier to hit.
The correction is automatically applied to the bullet to make it easier to hit.

・Space key

Shoot bullets.
You can kill an enemy by hitting it with a bullet.

【Enemy Characteristics】 ・Pink color

It will go straight somewhere.
Avoid by moving.

・Yellow target

It will follow you.
It will follow you wherever you go, so be sure to defeat it as soon as possible.
